ClassDesc: Constants related to a root of documents, including @B_android#database#Cursor_E@ column names and flags. A root is the start of a tree of documents, such as a physical storage device, or an account. Each root starts at the directory referenced by @B_android#provider#DocumentsContract#Root#COLUMN_DOCUMENT_ID_E@, which can recursively contain both documents and directories. All columns are read-only to client applications.
